ratings.comment: I took Dr.Kang's GEOG564 course this semester. It was his first year as an assistant professor but I think he did a good job! His course was a bit challenging, but the combination of dicussions and assignments helped in my understanding of the material.

Yuhao was my TA in GEOG 573 class. He is awesome! He helped us a lot in class and after class, he was always patient and ready to answer our questions. He is highly skilled at Geospatial Analytics and techniques. I would definitely recommend you to take his class. I wish I could stay at UW-Madison a litte bit longer so I can take his class again!
Great TA. Class taught by him was a lot of work but exceptionally helpful for learning how to code. Gives great help and is a fair grader.
